snippet: The State Supreme Court denied Gov. Chris Christie’s effort to block the weddings until an appeal was settled.
abstract: New Jersey Supreme Court denies Gov Chris Christie's attempt to block same-sex marriages until appeal of ruling allowing marriages is settled; while court's ruling applies only to request for a stay, it also indicates that justices doubt appeal will succeed.
lead_paragraph: The State Supreme Court denied Gov. Chris Christie’s effort to block the weddings until an appeal was settled.

headline.main: Same-Sex Marriages in New Jersey Can Begin, Court Rules
headline.print_headline:
Gay Marriage
In New Jersey
Can Begin,
Court Rules

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
